Title: Reconcilable Dissidents
Description:
My hope, $n, is that our work to understand the rebels will allow us to find a path to peace.

My concern is if we are not able to come to an understanding with Belaphon, other rebels may see her as a martyr for the cause.

Whatever happens, you have my gratitude for your assistance throughout this rebellion.
ObjectivesText: Listen to Alexstrasza's conversation with Instigator Belaphon.
